title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Morning news brief
items.description: Right-wing influencer's fraud claim leads to threats for Somali daycare owners, DOJ's initial release of Epstein files left many questions unanswered,...

items.description: The Zaporizhzhia plant, occupied by Russia, would be crucial to powering Ukraine’s postwar recovery.

items.title: Trump Says U.S. Is ‘Locked and Loaded’ if Iran Kills Protesters
items.description: Mr. Trump’s remarks that he was ready to come to the protesters’ “rescue” are a sharp escalation as protests over economic hardship turned deadly.

items.title: Brain organoids are helping researchers, but their use also creates unease
items.description: Pea-size clusters of human cells called brain organoids inspire both hope and fear. Experts are debating how scientists can responsibly use these bits...

items.title: A fire in an Swiss ski resort bar has left about 40 people dead

items.title: With Obamacare’s Higher Premiums Come Difficult Decisions
items.description: As enhanced subsidies expire, many Americans covered under the Affordable Care Act are having trouble paying for insurance.

items.title: After Watergate, the Presidency Was Tamed. Trump Is Unleashing It.
items.description: In the 1970s, Congress passed a raft of laws to hold the White House accountable. President Trump has decided they don’t apply to him.

items.title: Swiss Resort Bar Fire: 17-Year-Old Italian Golfer Is One of the First Identified Victims
items.description: Mr. Galeppini, 17, was a promising young golfer from Genoa who lived in Dubai with his family, the Italian media reported.

items.title: In the Arctic, Drones Help Identify Deadly Virus in Whales
items.description: Scientists took samples from whale blow, identifying possible disease risks for marine mammals in northern seas.

items.title: There Was Probably a Flashover in the Swiss Bar Fire. Here’s What That Means.
items.description: A flashover is an event where an entire room is rapidly engulfed in flames.
